AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hugo Benavides: United States Border Patrol Agent who was informed about the encounter with illegal aliens in a white sedan on FM 2050 and was aware of the suspicious activities of the two vehicles
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Luis Trevino: United States Border Patrol Agent who encountered illegal aliens in a white sedan and a black truck on FM 2050, and radioed for assistance to be on the lookout for the black truck
Defendant whose vehicle was stopped by Agent Trevino, and who was arrested after the encounter with illegal aliens in the white sedan
Defendant who was traveling to Dallas, and whose statement validated the Border Patrol agents' suspicions regarding the route being driven by the two vehicles
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR. and IGNACIO RODRI: Defendants whose vehicles were stopped by Agent Trevino, and who were suspected of being involved in alien smuggling activities
